original_title: STARRCAST IV: Making History With Ron Simmons
overview: One fateful night, Big Van Vader was slated to defend the WCW World Championship against Sting in Baltimore. By the end of the night, however, tears were flowing and glass ceilings had been shattered forever as Ron Simmons ascended to the throne as the new WCW World Champion. Simmons sits down to discuss that magnificent moment in time, the ripple effect his historic championship reign had on Simmons himself, pro wrestling overall and more.
title: STARRCAST IV: Making History With Ron Simmons
